scripts.clean: rm -f -r node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json && rm -f -r ./dist  && rm -f  -r ./packages/**/node_modules
scripts.local-ci: rm -f -r ./dist && npm run eslint && npm run test-unit && npm run test-functional && npm audit --audit-level=low && npm run test-links
scripts.dev-docs: nodemon --signal SIGKILL --trace-warnings --verbose --watch ./packages/game_editor --watch ./packages/visualizer --watch ./packages/widget_guided_tour --watch ./packages/show_room/src --watch ./packages/extensions_3d_tiles_temporal/src  --watch ./packages/frame3d/src  --watch ./packages/game_browser/src  --watch ./packages/game_browser_template/src  --watch ./packages/game_node/src  --watch ./packages/game_node_template/src  --watch ./packages/game_shared/src  --watch ./packages/game_shared_template/src  --watch ./packages/smdb/src  --watch ./packages/utils_browser/src  --watch ./packages/utils_node/src  --watch ./packages/utils_shared/src  --watch ./packages/widget_3d_tiles/src  --watch ./packages/widget_base_map/src  --watch ./packages/widget_bookmark/src  --watch ./packages/widget_camera_positioner/src  --watch ./packages/widget_extensions_3d_tiles_temporal/src  --watch ./packages/widget_geocoding/src  --watch ./packages/widget_layer_choice/src  --watch ./packages/widget_planar_controls/src  --watch ./packages/widget_slide_show/src  --watch ./packages/widget_sparql/src  --watch ./packages/widget_workspace/src --watch ./packages/widget_legonizer/src --delay 2500ms --exec npm run docs -e js,css
scripts.start: npm run build-examples && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run back-end
